	display:-webkit-box;

	-ms-flex-align:center;
	align-items:center;
	text-align:center;
	width:100%
}

	content:"";

	flex:100;
	height:1px;

	content:" +";
	font-weight:normal
}

	content:" −"
}
.site-footer__menu [type=checkbox]~div{
	max-height:0;
	overflow:hidden
}

	max-height:inherit;
	overflow:inherit
}

	font-size:1.125rem;

		max-height:inherit;
